Method.name: OnPage
Method.Implementation:
#dim %request As %CSP.Request #dim %response As %CSP.Response
Set Method = $Get(%request.Data("method",1))
Xecute "do .."_Method_"()"
Quit $$$OK

Method.name: GetMedicos
Method.Implementation:
set listaMedicos=[]
set query = "SELECT ID1, Name FROM MEDProvider order by name" set rs = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",.query)
while(rs.%Next()){ set medico ={} set medico.codMedico=rs.%Get("ID1") set medico.nomeMedico=rs.%Get("Name") do listaMedicos.%Push(medico) }
w listaMedicos.%ToJSON()
quit

Method.name: GetPacientes
Method.Implementation:
set listaPacientes=[]
set query = "SELECT PatientID, Name FROM MEDPatient order by Name" set rs = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",.query)
while(rs.%Next()){ set paciente ={} set paciente.codPaciente=rs.%Get("PatientID") set paciente.nomePaciente=rs.%Get("Name") do listaPacientes.%Push(paciente) }
w listaPacientes.%ToJSON()
quit

Method.name: GetConvenio
Method.Implementation:
set listaConvenio=[]
set query = "SELECT Codigo, Nome FROM MEDConvenio order by Nome" set rs = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",.query)
while(rs.%Next()){ set convenio ={} set convenio.codConvenio=rs.%Get("Codigo") set convenio.nomeConvenio=rs.%Get("Nome") do listaConvenio.%Push(convenio) }
w listaConvenio.%ToJSON()
quit

Method.name: GetProcedimento
Method.Implementation:
set listaProcedimento=[]
set query = "SELECT SearchWord, Text FROM VARPARA WHERE PARAMETERNAME='HONORARIOTIPOCONSULTA'" set rs = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",.query)
while(rs.%Next()){ set procedimento ={} set procedimento.codProcedimento=rs.%Get("SearchWord") set procedimento.nomeProcedimento=rs.%Get("Text") do listaProcedimento.%Push(procedimento) }
w listaProcedimento.%ToJSON()
quit

Method.name: ListaRelatorio
recStatusAnterior
